sn48.54:4.1: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yāni kānici jaṅgalānaṃ pāṇānaṃ padajātāni sabbāni tāni hatthipade samodhānaṃ gacchanti, hatthipadaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—
sn48.54:4.3: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yāni kānici padāni bodhāya saṃvattanti, paññindriyaṃ padaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—
sn48.54:4.5: Katamāni ca, bhikkhave, padāni bodhāya saṃvattanti?
sn48.54:4.6: Saddhindriyaṃ, bhikkhave, padaṃ, taṃ bodhāya saṃvattati;
sn48.54:4.11: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yāni kānici jaṅgalānaṃ pāṇānaṃ padajātāni sabbāni tāni hatthipade samodhānaṃ gacchanti, hatthipadaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—
sn48.54:4.13: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yāni kānici padāni bodhāya saṃvattanti, paññindriyaṃ padaṃ tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati, yadidaṃ—
